GameDebug - Class in game
 
GameDebug(int, String, String) - Constructor for class game.GameDebug
Performed before a game in debug mode, this function makes sure that the necessary files are present and correctly read: Furthermore, it verifies if the card file has a list of cards large enough to execute every command in the command file.

P

placeBet() - Method in class game.Game
If the last bet was 0, place a bet of 5, otherwise place a bet of the last bet
placeBet(int) - Method in class game.Game
A bet cannot be placed after the deal, if another already made, if the bet value is not between 1 and 5 credits, or if the bet value is higher than the current credits.
